理.definition: texture; grain (of wood); inner essence; intrinsic order; reason; logic; truth; science; natural science (esp. physics); to manage; to pay attention to; to run (affairs); to handle; to put in order; to tidy up

理中客.definition: rational, neutral, objective (abbr. for 理性、中立、客觀|理性、中立、客观[li3 xing4 , zhong1 li4 , ke4 guan1])

理事.definition: member of council; (literary) to take care of matters

理光.definition: Ricoh, Japanese imaging and electronics company

理化.definition: physics and chemistry; (archaic) governance and education

理塘.definition: Litang county (Tibetan: li thang rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)

理塘縣.definition: Litang county (Tibetan: li thang rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)

理學家.definition: scholar of the rationalist school of Neo-Confucianism 理學|理学[Li3 xue2]

理容院.definition: hairdresser and beauty parlor; barbershop; massage parlor

理屈詞窮.definition: lit. having presented a flawed argument, one has nothing further to add (idiom); fig. unable to provide a convincing argument to support one's position; to not have a leg to stand on

理工.definition: science and engineering as academic subjects

理工大學.definition: University of Science and Engineering; also sometimes Institute of Technology

理工科.definition: science and engineering as academic subjects

理性與感性.definition: Sense and Sensibility, novel by Jane Austen 珍·奧斯汀|珍·奥斯汀[Zhen1 · Ao4 si1 ting1]

理想.definition: an ideal; a dream; ideal; perfect

理所當然.definition: as it should be by rights (idiom); proper and to be expected as a matter of course; inevitable and right

理會.definition: to understand; to pay attention to; to take notice of

理氣化痰.definition: (TCM) to rectify 氣|气[qi4] and transform phlegm

理清.definition: to disentangle (wiring etc); (fig.) to clarify (one's thoughts etc)

理監事.definition: member of a board of directors

理直氣壯.definition: in the right and self-confident (idiom); bold and confident with justice on one's side; to have the courage of one's convictions; just and forceful

理睬.definition: to heed; to pay attention to

理神論.definition: deism, theological theory of God who does not interfere in the Universe

理科.definition: the sciences (as opposed to the humanities 文科[wen2 ke1])

理縣.definition: Li County (Tibetan: li rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang Autonomous Prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan

理論.definition: theory; CL:個|个[ge4]; to argue; to take notice of

理財.definition: to manage wealth; to manage finances; money management

理賠.definition: to settle a claim; claims settlement; payment of claims

理雅各.definition: James Legge (1815-1897), Scottish Protestant missionary in Qing China and translator of the Chinese classics into English

理順.definition: to straighten out; to sort out; to organize

理頭.definition: to have a haircut; to cut sb's hair

理髮.definition: to get a haircut; to have one's hair done; to cut (sb's) hair; to give (sb) a haircut
